R

read(char[], int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.java.util.InputStreamTokenizer
Implements the abstract method AbstractTokenizer.read(char[], int, int) by wrapping the InputStreamReader.read() call of the JDK standard class InputStreamReader.
read(char[], int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.java.util.AbstractTokenizer
This is the abstract method to be implemented by derived classes.
read(char[], int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.jtopas.ReaderSource
The method calls the Reader.read(char[], int, int) method of the currently backing Reader.
read(char[], int, int) - Method in interface de.susebox.jtopas.TokenizerSource
A basic method to supply character data for a Tokenizer.
read(char[], int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.jtopas.PluginTokenizer
Deprecated. Implements the abstract method AbstractTokenizer.read(char[], int, int) by wrapping the InputStreamReader.read() call of the JDK standard class InputStreamReader.
read(char[], int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.jtopas.InputStreamSource
Deprecated. A basic method to supply data to a Tokenizer.
ReaderSource - class de.susebox.jtopas.ReaderSource.
This implementation of the TokenizerSource interface uses the JDK Reader class to realize the requested functionality.
ReaderSource() - Constructor for class de.susebox.jtopas.ReaderSource
The default constructor constructs a ReaderSource instance that reads from nowhere.
ReaderSource(Reader) - Constructor for class de.susebox.jtopas.ReaderSource
Constructing an ReaderSource object with the given Reader instance to get input data from.

readString(int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.java.util.AbstractTokenizer
This method reads characters in a string until it detects the end of the string (this is the end sequence of the string, '"' in C and Java) It should use AbstractTokenizer.getChar(int) or AbstractTokenizer.getCharUnchecked(int) to retrieve a character to check.
readWhitespaces(int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.java.util.AbstractTokenizer
This method detects the number of whitespace characters starting at the given position.
readWhitespaces(int, int) - Method in class de.susebox.jtopas.StandardTokenizer
